column5: HONG KONG  July 15 (IFR) - Deutsche Bank has hired Kefei Li from UBS  where he was head of equity capital markets for China  according to sources familiar with the move.  At Deutsche  where he will take on a senior ECM role  Li will be based in Hong Kong. He is expected to start in October and report to Bhupinder Singh  co-head of Asia Pacific corporate banking and securities  and Mark Hantho  global head of equity capital markets. UBS confirmed Li's resignation but declined to comment further.

column4: Itau Unibanco sees Brazil's economy shrinking in 2016
column5: BRASILIA  July 15 Brazil's recession will extend into next year  hurting President Dilma Rousseff's efforts to shore up public finances and arrest a sharp increase in unemployment  Itau Unibanco's chief economist said in a report on Wednesday.

column4: Exclusive: Apax taps JP Morgan and UBS for $1.1 billion exit of Rhiag - sources
column5: LONDON European private equity firm Apax [APAX.UL] has hired JP Morgan  and UBS  to explore a stock market listing or sale of its Italian auto-parts distributor Rhiag  six sources familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Kinder Morgan considering LPG  product and potential crude exports

column5: Kinder Morgan Inc  said it would buy the 49 percent stake that it does not already own in natural gas joint venture Elba Liquefaction Co from Royal Dutch Shell Plc   and it raised its dividend.

column4: REFILE-BRIEF-Pfizer's Indian unit intends to close Navi Mumbai plant
